features: Innovative pour over coffee maker that makes barista-quality coffee at home.
Made from premium borosilicate glass that’s non-porous and doesn’t absorb taste or aroma.
Permanent stainless steel filter that produces a rich taste and robust aroma.
Environmentally friendly brewing method – no paper filters or plastic capsules.
Easy to use and easy to clean.
body.description: About the Filter Coffee Maker Pour Over BODUM’s Pour Over coffee maker is the key to making richer, bolder coffee from the comfort of your home. Its design-led aesthetic is a stylish addition to any kitchen, but it’s the resulting full-bodied, smooth tasting coffee with a robust aroma that will win your heart. Made from premium quality borosilicate glass that doesn’t absorb taste or aroma, the beautifully shaped carafe is fitted with a permanent stainless steel filter for truly sustainable brewing. No wasteful paper filters that trap essential oils and flavor; just pure flavorsome coffee. Pour over brewing encourages a more mindful start to your day. This innovative, fuss-free filter coffee maker is simple to use and gives you ultimate control over your cup of joe. All you need is filter coffee grounds, hot water, four minutes of your day and a little Bodum magic – and you have all the ingredients for a delicious brew. This is pour over, perfected. Main Features & Benefits

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bodum - From the Soul of Slow Coffee.

Bodum Pour Over Coffee Makers with Permanent Filter The BODUM POUR OVER Coffee Maker has a fine mesh stainless steel filter that eliminates the need for paper filters. This promotes the pure unfolding of the flavor - no more paper filters that trap the essential oils and flavors. This coffee maker from BODUM sets new standards in the preparation of delectable coffees: no paper filters - just pure flavor. Proudly Made in Europe!

How to Brew a Delicious Cup of Pour Over Coffee: Step 1 Begin by filling the filter with coarsely ground coffee. For each 4 Oz use 1 rounded tbsp or 1 BODUM scoop (included). Step 2 Wait 10-15 seconds after the boil has completed before pouring water in. Use a circular motion over the ground coffee until soaked. Slowly pour the remaining hot water into the filter. Step 3 The Coffee will drip into the borosilicate glass carafe. For the best possible flavor, let it brew for about 4 minutes. Step 4 After the 4-minute brew is complete, remove the filter from the carafe and you are free to enjoy a delicious cup of Pour Over Coffee.

Bodum quality in every component: Borosilicate Glass Carafe The carafe is made with Borosilicate Glass; which one the most temperature-resistant glass types you can buy. Cork or Silicone Band Whether you choose our cork or silicone band; your grip will be strong and hands cool when pouring a delicious cup. Stainless Steel Permanent Filter The included stainless steel permanent filter eliminates the need for wasteful paper filters and is dishwasher safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quickly becoming my favorite way to make coffee
reviews.reviewText: As a coffee enthusiast, I've tried various coffee makers, including the French Press, Aeropress, OXO 8-Cup Coffee Maker (Gold Cup certified by SCA), and ceramic Hario V60. However, this double-walled BODUM is quickly becoming my favorite. I would give it 5 stars without hesitation.Firstly, the coffee produced by this pour-over coffee maker is excellent. The flavor is rich and full-bodied, and I find that the double-walled design keeps the coffee nice and warm without over-extracting the coffee. The double-walled design also makes it easy to handle the carafe without burning my fingers.Secondly, I appreciate how easy it is to use this coffee maker. The simple design makes it easy to brew a perfect cup of coffee every time, and the cork grip adds a nice touch of style and comfort. It's also easy to clean, which is always a plus.Lastly, the double-walled version of this coffee maker is great at keeping the coffee warm for an extended period of time. However, it doesn't come with a lid, so you need to drink the coffee quickly or transfer to a thermal carafe. That being said, this is a minor issue compared to the overall quality and convenience of the design.Overall, I would highly recommend this BODUM to any coffee lover looking for a high-quality pour-over coffee maker. The flavor of the coffee is great, it's easy to use, and the double-walled design keeps the coffee warm. It's quickly becoming my go-to coffee maker, and I'm very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really happy with this!
reviews.reviewText: ●▬▬▬▬๑۩ I HIGHLY RECOMEND ۩๑▬▬▬▬▬●I purchased this product originally for loose tea. However it sure has been used for coffee too now LOL.●▬▬▬▬๑۩ PACKING / PRODUCT PACKAGE ۩๑▬▬▬▬▬●This item comes in its own box and packed well enough to not have issues in transit.●▬▬▬▬๑۩ QUALITY ۩๑▬▬▬▬▬●VERY! I was surprised at the quality of this coffee maker. The glass itself is thicker then I expected. I have accidentally tapped it on my granite sink side and winced. But there were no issues at all! The filter at the top has very small holes. Very high shine metal which has not stained with repeated daily use. The plastic that holds the metal panels is heavy duty and quality. Around the middle you see a black wrap. That is hard plastic with a softer stretchable rubber that wraps around it to hold the plastic in place. It is thick and does provide a good grip when pouring.●▬▬▬▬๑۩ USE ۩๑▬▬▬▬▬●I use this for loose tea and for coffee. Use a cone coffee filter in the top if you find you are not gaining the strength of coffee or tea that you would like. This will slow the water down and allow it to sit longer with the grounds or leaves. Using is super simple, just set the cone in the top, scoop in your grounds (medium grounds if you can) and heat water in a kettle on the stove. Just before water boil, you know when you see steam but not bubbles just yet. Pour that slowly over the top of the cone, I personally like to pour it around the edge of the filter to wash the grounds or leaves back into the middle. Either way you do it, you will find your zen with it. It really is a relaxing task for me, forces a person to slow down and enjoy the moment, the smell of the fresh coffee, and the warmth of the water.After its all filtered down, I toss the grounds or leaves out and rinse the top filter right away, setting that out to dry. It comes with a sturdy plastic center stopper, just pop that in the middle and pour your mug. It stays reasonably warm for a lingering amount of time. Through a good 2-3 cups of coffee easy. (I bought the 34 oz)●▬▬▬▬๑۩ NOTE ۩๑▬▬▬▬▬●I would gift this in a heartbeat, it is unique, pleasant to use and quality! Warm wishes to everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use and Great Taste
reviews.reviewText: This has been a great pour over coffee maker. It's easy to use with simple durable parts. It is easy to use and produces a great cup of coffee. I have been using a variety of coffee and I feel it's superior to the taste I get from a re-usable Keurig pod or even a premium Keurig pod. It's less bitter than my french press as well.There are two small downsides. First, it's about 16oz of coffee. That is great for me, but it would not be efficient for 3+ people. No big deal - that's just how it is and I got it for basically making 2 cups at a time so I love it. The strap can be a little annoying because no matter where I put the drawstring it's still something you can feel when you old the coffee maker. It's not a design flaw - it just is there and you can feel it. Since I only pour 2 cups out of this, it has never been an actual problem.

Gurl you need to buy this if you're thinking about switching, first and foremost it doesnt cost any electricity at all, just you and your arm to pour hot water in it. It's fantastic and makes good coffee and easy to clean, easy to use, and super ecofriendly and hyper good looking like, this is yas slay versace boots the house down wig yas charli xcx werqq queen bussy king, wig for the holyslay

reviews.reviewTitle: Für den Genuss und zum entschleunigen
reviews.reviewText: Wenn man sich bei der Kaffee Zubereitung Zeit nimmt, so wie es sein sollte. Dann erwartet einem etwas besonderes. Mit guter Bohne (keine totgerößtete Aktivkohle aus Arabika), die selbst gemalene langsam in diesem gefäß aufgegossen wird, ist einiges an neuen Nuance des Kaffeegenusses möglich.
Som beskrivningen utlovar varken mer eller mindre.

reviews.reviewText: Can’t figure it out which model has extra filter and what the hell is dishwasher safe means. Is it a second filter other than the metal one or is there another layer of filter ? Really confused.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Only been a few days,but really noticed a difference in my coffee,much smoother and no longer that bitter taste.However I think it’s also important to use a gooseneck kettle and gently pour over the coffee,it’s like Guiness,how you handle it is important
